Convo: ^Hey Harv, you getting the hang of it now?

c-0: ^Yeah, actually, I am. It's really fun!
c-1: ^It's actually a bit challenging right now. So many things going on and all.

C1: ^REALLY!? I figured you would have had a harder time adjusting to it. THIS IS SO EXCITING!!!

c-0: ^I admit that there's a bit of a learning curve to it, but it's not a problem at all.
^That's great tho! We needed someone who could do it all anyways. Keep it up Harv!
c-1: ^You really didn't think I'd get the hang of it this fast? So little faith in me. Tsk tsk tsk.
^OH SHUT IT, you know that's not what I meant. You're reputation and reliance isn't all that good so I wasn't sure how you would do. Just keep proving me wrong if you got an issue with that!

C2: ^Just take charge and stay strong. That's how I did it when we started out. You got this, I know you do.

c-0: ^You really think that I can handle it all?
^Of course!! Just have faith in yourself!
c-1: ^What about if I screw it all up? The concert would be ruined.
^You're NOT allowed to talk like that. There will be no Debbie-Downers in this family if I can help it. Just get out there and do your best!
